League of Research {Work in Progress}

// MFA Thesis project at Media Design Practices, ArtCenter College of Design

LR is a Multiplayer Online Writing Arena (MOWA). The platform is designed to facilitate and capture the interactions between scientists when collaboratively writing a scientific research paper. The project questions how â€œscientific facts" are edited and presented, tracks accountability of the scientific knowledge disseminated into the world, and generates a new form of authorship that challenges the traditional hierarchy.

Year 2015
Client Personal
Role Designer
Mentors Ben Hooker, Arden Stern,
Anne Burdick, Jesse Kriss,
Tim Schwartz

WIP Note

Believe it or not, the science community has a lot to learn from video games. By juxtapositioning the two dramatically different realms, I am hope to provoke conversations about better practice for the progress of science.

In the next few months, I will be working on refining the interaction design on LoR platform, developing a complete ecology around the new platform, and prototyping demos.


Email me if you see an opportunity for collaboration, and be sure to check in later for updates!

 Scientists are superheors and dragon slayers!
